cards.name: Gendry
cards.text: While you control no loyal characters, Gendry gains renown. Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a non-loyal character with a Weapon attachment. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains each of Gendry's keywords.

cards.name: Antler Men
cards.text: Reaction: After power is moved to your faction card, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Storm's End
cards.text: During the challenges phase, characters without a [power] icon cannot stand. Reaction: After a [military] or [intrigue] challenge is initiated in which you are the attacking or defending player, kneel Storm's End to change the challenge type to [power].

cards.name: Erik Anvil-Breaker
cards.text:
Intimidate. Pillage. Renown.
Erik Anvil-Breaker cannot stand during the standing phase.

cards.name: Ten Towers Host
cards.text:
Assault. No attachments.
While Ten Towers Host is attacking an opponent whose reserve value is 4 or lower, it gets +3 STR and gains renown.

cards.name: Pyke
cards.text: Each Warship location in your hand gains ambush (X). X is 1 less than that cards printed cost. Reaction: After a [greyjoy] location enters play under your control, choose another non-loyal, non-limited card with an equal or lower printed cost. Kneel Pyke to place that card on top of its owner's deck. At the end of the phase, that card's owner draws 1 card.

cards.name: Ser Jaime Lannister
cards.text: Renown. Forced Reaction: After a character enters play during the challenges phase, stand Ser Jaime Lannister. Then, discard that character from play.

cards.name: Casterly Rock
cards.text: While Casterly Rock is standing, you may spend gold on [lannister] cards you control as if it were in your gold pool. Marshaling Action: Kneel Casterly Rock to choose up to 3 cards. Each of those cards gains 1 gold.

cards.name: Lady Whiskers
cards.text:
Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1).
If attached character is Tommen Baratheon, he gains stealth.
Attached character does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [power] challenge.

cards.name: Trystane Martell
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Trystane Martell enters play, choose a character with no challenge icons and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Scorpion Knight
cards.text: Reaction: After a character's challenge icon is removed by a card effect, Scorpion Knight gets +1 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: Sunspear
cards.text: During the challenges phase, you may spend gold on Sunspear as if it were in your gold pool. Reaction: After a [martell] card enters play under your control, Sunspear gains 1 gold. (2 gold instead if that card is a Lord or Lady character.) (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Samwell Tarly
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Samwell Tarly is participating, if your reserve value is: - 6 or higher, draw 1 card. - 8 or higher, gain 1 power for your faction. - 10 or higher, choose and stand another character that shares a Trait with him, if able.

cards.name: Castle Black
cards.text: Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, choose and stand a [thenightswatch] character or Castle Black. (Limit once per phase.) Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered location ability would initiate, kneel Castle Black to cancel those effects.

cards.name: First Builder
cards.text: Unique character only. Attached character gains a [power] icon and the Builder trait. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge in which you control a participating Builder character, search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment or location with printed cost X or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand. X is the number of Builder characters you control. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Bran Stark
cards.text: Each Old Gods character you control cannot be bypassed by stealth or knelt by card effects. Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge in which you control a participating Old Gods character, instead of the normal claim effects, look at the defending player's hand. Then, choose and discard X cards from that hand, if able. X is the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card.

cards.name: Lady
cards.text: No attachments. Interrupt: When another Direwolf card or Sansa Stark would leave play, kill Lady to save that card.

cards.name: Winterfell Castle
cards.text: Each character with the highest printed cost among unique [stark] characters you control gains the Old Gods trait and insight. Interrupt: When an Old Gods card would be killed or discarded from play, kneel that card to save it. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Ser Rolly Duckfield
cards.text: While you control Aegon Targaryen, he gains a [military] icon. Interrupt: When a King or Lord character would be killed, discard 1 card from your hand to save it. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: “Duck will die for me if need be, and that's all I require in my Kingsguard.” <cite>Aegon Targaryen</cite>

cards.name: Warlock of Qarth
cards.text: Reaction: After a character enters an opponent's dead pile, sacrifice Warlock of Qarth to put that character into play under your control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains insight. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it in its owner's dead pile (cannot be saved).

cards.name: The Great Pyramid
cards.text: Twice per round, you may marshal or play a facedown card under a Meereen location you control as if it were in your hand. Reaction: After 1 or more cards are discarded from your hand, place them facedown under The Great Pyramid. If The Great Pyramid leaves play, remove each card you placed under it from the game. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: Up here in her garden Dany sometimes felt like a god, living atop the highest mountain in the world. Do all gods feel so lonely?

cards.name: Alla Tyrell
cards.text: Interrupt: When Alla Tyrell is revealed from your hand or deck, put her into play.

cards.name: Highgarden
cards.text: Challenges Action: Return a unique [tyrell] character to your hand to reveal the top card of each player's deck. (Limit once per phase.) Challenges Action: Kneel Highgarden to reveal up to 3 [tyrell] characters from your hand. For each card revealed this way, choose a character to get +2 STR until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Brienne the Blue
cards.text: Action: Choose a character that is attacking or defending alone. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +5 STR. (+10 STR instead if it is Brienne of Tarth or a Rainbow Guard character.)

cards.name: Zollo the Fat
cards.text: Reaction: After an opponent gains gold, if it is not the marshaling phase, sacrifice Zollo the Fat to move all gold from that player's gold pool to your own.
cards.flavor: Captured again by the Brave Companions, and maimed at the word of Vargo Hoat their captain, losing his sword hand to the blade of Zollo the Fat.

cards.name: King's Landing
cards.text: Reaction: After a King's Landing location enters play, kneel it to draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.) Marshaling Action: Kneel a King's Landing location to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: The Horn of Winter
cards.text: Unique character only. Attached character gains assault. Reaction: After you win a challenge, sacrifice The Horn of Winter to choose a location that was targeted by assault this challenge. Until the end of the round, treat that location as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). If it is a Stronghold location or The Wall, you may discard it from play instead.

cards.name: "Florian and Jonquil"
cards.text: Action: Choose a unique character with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown. Then, attach "Florian and Jonquil" to that character as an attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gains the Fool and Knight traits."

cards.name: Bran the Builder
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a location, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: The Mad King's Command
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player chooses up to 3 characters, up to 3 locations, up to 3 attachments, and up to 3 cards in their hand and/or shadows area. Place each card not chosen on the bottom of its owner's deck (cannot be saved).
cards.flavor: "Burn them all," he said. "Burn them in their homes. Burn them in their beds."
